author: Christopher Cadelago
title: Swing-state Democratic governors under duress over stay-at-home orders
description: Republican state legislators are demanding that their economies reopen sooner than later — fights with big implications for Trump's reelection.
content:
The state House in Michigan has been under Republican control for the past decade, but Democrats are four seats away from flipping the chamber. In the Michigan state Senate, Democrats need three to tie and four to flip the upper chamber.
